snippet: United Technologies’ retirement plan protects hard-earned savings from a volatile stock market while ensuring the money will never run out.
abstract: United Technologies’ 401(k) retirement plan protects workers' savings from a volatile stock market while ensuring the money will never run out; employee savings in midcareer are gradually shifted into variable annuities that guarantee minimum level of income for life, starting at retirement.
lead_paragraph: United Technologies’ retirement plan protects hard-earned savings from a volatile stock market while ensuring the money will never run out.

headline.seo: A 401(k) That Promises Income for Life
headline.main: A 401(k) That Promises Never to Run Dry
headline.print_headline: A 401(k) That Promises Never to Run Dry
